Text: lol I wrote Spanish. I meant Japanese lol!

Could you upload Point Break, Carlito's Way, The Sopranos and Entourage T.V Series please. 

You're doing a fantastic job, love your work!!
Sanchez101 - I'm sorry. I generally only do things that I need or want. If there is enough demand, then I upload it.

^ Why? The uploader clearly stated they're not part of YIFY team. They added subtitles to a YIFY rip, which I'm sure some people appreciate so they don't have to hardcode the subs and remux themselves.

To clear up confusion, YIFY hardcodes are only being uploaded with explicit permission by Yify himself and his team. And I agreed to display their name, the original encoder, and so forth prominently in the title, file name, description, and read me file.
